adrFormatAddress: 42 Bond St 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text: Willow is a fantastic family-owned agency ran by the nicest and most hardworking people I’ve had the pleasure of knowing. Consider them for your business if you want people who genuinely care for the success of their clients and will root for you, thank you Stacie and Bob!

text.text: Willow is a fantastic family-owned agency ran by the nicest and most hardworking people I’ve had the pleasure of knowing. Consider them for your business if you want people who genuinely care for the success of their clients and will root for you, thank you Stacie and Bob!

originalText.text: In response to the last review, I'm not sure why that person would say that. It's not true at all. Willow gives a list of suggested photographers to their new models so that they have some direction to start test shooting and building their portfolios. (Most agencies will give their New Faces a list like this to help them get started.) But the models can definitely shoot with anyone they want as long as the photos are agency quality. I have shot with photographers that are not on the list and those images are on their website and in my book currently.

text.text: In response to the last review, I'm not sure why that person would say that. It's not true at all. Willow gives a list of suggested photographers to their new models so that they have some direction to start test shooting and building their portfolios. (Most agencies will give their New Faces a list like this to help them get started.) But the models can definitely shoot with anyone they want as long as the photos are agency quality. I have shot with photographers that are not on the list and those images are on their website and in my book currently.

originalText.text: Models Beware: Willow will want you to spend hundreds/thousands on photographs and will only allow you to use their own photographers.  From the U.S. FTC this is a scam practice:  "To break into the business, you need professional photos. But you should be able to choose your own photographer. An agency that requires you to use their photographers likely is a scam".

originalText.text: these people are soooooo nice! Bob and Stacie are awesome and their knowledge of the industry runs deep. Perfect for newer faces lookin to find a smaller agency where they can receive more personalized attention and help develop their look

originalText.text: Super friendly and polished. Stacie was incredibly kind and welcoming and made each minute of my time talking to her feel important :)
